x = float(input())

if x >= 0:
    print("Positive")
elif x < 0:
    print("Negative")
else:
    print("Zero")

# ------ Print Yes if you will turn on the air conditioner; print No otherwise ------

# Read an integer:

# Print a value:
if a >= 30:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')
